entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW IN THE EVENING

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 8 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
